channel.title: How to make a client, to dump mods....?
channel.description: as the title say :| i dont mean a online client just offline.... whith mods i mean : godswords, dragon full helm, self greated items, etc. pls help me, thnx :P :o

item.title: How to make a client, to dump mods....?
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

oh, so u cant really help me
ontopic again.
why nobody know how to make a client (to get the class files, models and maybe cash), much people got a client. why they dont explain it to me (or maybe other people too)?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 03:38:40 am[/size][hr]ok i got the basic filles from this site : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381576.0.html

but do i have to edit now? i already edited the name’s.
when i loggin i get an error, it says “Connection error”.

item.title: How to make a client, to dump mods....?

item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

that should me great but remember… i’m a beginner ;D
btw i think i got a compile :

@echo off
title weeds compiler
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_14/bin/javac.exe” .java
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_14/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m server
pause
